text: John Knut Chrispinsson (13 December 1956 - 3 April 2017) was a Swedish journalist and television presenter. He worked mostly in TV and radio with news programs and historical programs. Chrispinsson also wrote several books on Swedish history. Chrispinsson died in Stockholm on 3 April 2017 from a heart attack complicated by borrelia, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1956 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Swedish television presenters Category:Swedish journalists Category:Writers from Stockholm
title: John Chrispinsson
